name: MemSource
overview:
MemSource provides a cloud-based translation platform that increases translator productivity.

MemSource Cloud includes translation memory, integrated machine translation, terminology management, quality assurance, and MemSource Editor, a translator’s workbench that is available as a free download.

MemSource Cloud is provided as a service at a monthly subscription fee. Its limited Personal edition is free. Most of the subscribers to the paid editions are translation companies.

MemSource is based in Prague, the Czech Republic. Its customers are based all over the world.
